mapper.sql: RELEASE_INFO_ID , TITEL, CONTENT, ATTACHMENT_ID, TYPE, BELONG_USER_ID, BELONG_CIRCLE_ID, STATUS, IS_DELETE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_BY_USER, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY_USER, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT wcc_user.USER_ID, wcc_user.HEAD_PORTRAIT AS ATT_ID, wcc_user.WECHAT_HEAD_PORTRAIT_ADDRESS, wcc_release_info.RELEASE_INFO_ID, wcc_user.NICKNAME, wcc_user.MEMBER, wcc_user.MEMBER_RANK, wcc_release_info.TYPE, wcc_release_info.TITEL, wcc_release_info.CONTENT, wcc_release_info.ATTACHMENT_ID, wcc_release_info.CREATION_DATE, ( SELECT count(1) FROM wcc_praise_favorite WHERE 1 = 1 AND STATUS = 1 AND IS_DELETE = 0 AND TYPE = 0 AND BELONG_ID = wcc_release_info.RELEASE_INFO_ID ) AS praise_count, (SELECT count(1) FROM wcc_response_details WHERE 1 = 1 AND STATUS = 1 AND IS_DELETE = 0 AND BELONG_ID = wcc_release_info.RELEASE_INFO_ID) AS comment_count, (SELECT count(1) FROM wcc_user_concern WHERE 1 = 1 AND STATUS = 1 AND IS_DELETE = 0 AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND BELONG_ID = wcc_user.USER_ID) AS concern_count FROM wcc_user, wcc_release_info WHERE 1 = 1 AND wcc_user.USER_ID = wcc_release_info.BELONG_USER_ID AND wcc_user.STATUS = 1 AND wcc_user.IS_DELETE = 0 AND wcc_release_info.STATUS = 1 AND wcc_release_info.IS_DELETE = 0 AND wcc_release_info.APPROVE_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY wcc_release_info.CREATION_DATE DESC LIMIT #{current}, #{size}

SELECT wri.RELEASE_INFO_ID, wri.TITEL, wri.CONTENT, rsa.url, wri.ATTACHMENT_ID, wri.TYPE, wri.BELONG_USER_ID, wri.BELONG_CIRCLE_ID, wri.STATUS, wri.IS_DELETE, wri.CREATED_BY, wri.CREATED_BY_USER, wri.CREATION_DATE, wri.LAST_UPDATED_BY_USER, wri.LAST_UPDATED_BY, wri.LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM (wcc_release_info AS wri, ray_sys_attachment AS rsa) WHERE wri.STATUS = 1 AND wri.IS_DELETE = 0 AND wri.APPROVE_STATUS = 1 AND rsa.is_recycle = 0 AND wri.ATTACHMENT_ID = rsa.id AND wri.TYPE = 3 ORDER BY wri.CREATION_DATE DESC LIMIT #{current}, #{size}

SELECT r.RELEASE_INFO_ID, r.TITEL, r.CONTENT, r.ATTACHMENT_ID, r.TYPE, r.BELONG_USER_ID, r.BELONG_CIRCLE_ID, r.STATUS, r.IS_DELETE, r.CREATED_BY, r.CREATED_BY_USER, r.CREATION_DATE, r.LAST_UPDATED_BY_USER, r.LAST_UPDATED_BY, r.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ( SELECT count(1) FROM wcc_praise_favorite f WHERE 1 = 1 AND f.STATUS = 1 AND f.IS_DELETE = 0 AND f.TYPE = 0 AND f.BELONG_ID = r.RELEASE_INFO_ID ) AS praise_count, (SELECT count(1) FROM wcc_response_details d WHERE 1 = 1 AND d.STATUS = 1 AND d.IS_DELETE = 0 AND d.BELONG_ID = r.RELEASE_INFO_ID) AS comment_count, u.NAME, u.NICKNAME, u.WECHAT_HEAD_PORTRAIT_ADDRESS FROM wcc_release_info r LEFT JOIN wcc_user u ON u.USER_ID = r.BELONG_USER_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND r.STATUS = 1 AND r.IS_DELETE = 0 AND r.RELEASE_INFO_ID = #{releaseInfoId} ORDER BY r.CREATION_DATE DESC LIMIT 0 ,1

SELECT wri.RELEASE_INFO_ID, wri.TITEL, wri.CONTENT, wri.ATTACHMENT_ID, wri.TYPE, wri.BELONG_USER_ID, wri.BELONG_CIRCLE_ID, wri.STATUS, wri.IS_DELETE, wri.CREATED_BY, wri.CREATED_BY_USER, wri.CREATION_DATE, wri.LAST_UPDATED_BY_USER, wri.LAST_UPDATED_BY, wri.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, (select wrd.CREATION_DATE from wcc_response_details wrd where wrd.USER_ID = #{userId} order by wrd.CREATION_DATE desc limit 0, 1) AS responseDetailsCreateDateNewest, ( SELECT count(1) FROM wcc_praise_favorite f WHERE 1 = 1 AND f.STATUS = 1 AND f.IS_DELETE = 0 AND f.TYPE = 0 AND f.BELONG_ID = wri.RELEASE_INFO_ID ) AS praise_count, (SELECT count(1) FROM wcc_response_details d WHERE 1 = 1 AND d.STATUS = 1 AND d.IS_DELETE = 0 AND d.BELONG_ID = wri.RELEASE_INFO_ID) AS comment_count FROM wcc_release_info wri, wcc_response_details wrd WHERE 1 = 1 AND wri.RELEASE_INFO_ID = wrd.BELONG_ID AND wrd.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY wrd.BELONG_ID ORDER BY responseDetailsCreateDateNewest LIMIT #{current}, #{size};

SELECT wri.RELEASE_INFO_ID, wri.TITEL, wri.CONTENT, wri.ATTACHMENT_ID, wri.TYPE, wri.BELONG_USER_ID, wri.BELONG_CIRCLE_ID, wri.STATUS, wri.IS_DELETE, wri.CREATED_BY, wri.CREATED_BY_USER, wri.CREATION_DATE, wri.LAST_UPDATED_BY_USER, wri.LAST_UPDATED_BY, wri.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ( SELECT count(1) FROM wcc_praise_favorite f WHERE 1 = 1 AND f.STATUS = 1 AND f.IS_DELETE = 0 AND f.TYPE = 0 AND f.BELONG_ID = wri.RELEASE_INFO_ID ) AS praise_count, (SELECT count(1) FROM wcc_response_details d WHERE 1 = 1 AND d.STATUS = 1 AND d.IS_DELETE = 0 AND d.BELONG_ID = wri.RELEASE_INFO_ID) AS comment_count FROM wcc_release_info wri, wcc_praise_favorite wpf WHERE 1 = 1 AND wri.RELEASE_INFO_ID = wpf.BELONG_ID AND wri.TYPE = #{type} AND wpf.USER_ID = #{favoritesUserId} AND wpf.IS_DELETE = 0 AND wpf.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY wri.CREATION_DATE limit #{current}, #{size};

SELECT wu.NICKNAME, wu.WECHAT_HEAD_PORTRAIT_ADDRESS, wri.RELEASE_INFO_ID, wri.TITEL, wri.CONTENT, wri.ATTACHMENT_ID, wri.TYPE, wri.BELONG_USER_ID, wri.BELONG_CIRCLE_ID, wri.STATUS, wri.IS_DELETE, wri.CREATED_BY, wri.CREATED_BY_USER, wri.CREATION_DATE, wri.LAST_UPDATED_BY_USER, wri.LAST_UPDATED_BY, wri.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ( SELECT count(1) FROM wcc_praise_favorite f WHERE 1 = 1 AND f.STATUS = 1 AND f.IS_DELETE = 0 AND f.TYPE = 0 AND f.BELONG_ID = wri.RELEASE_INFO_ID ) AS praise_count, (SELECT count(1) FROM wcc_response_details d WHERE 1 = 1 AND d.STATUS = 1 AND d.IS_DELETE = 0 AND d.BELONG_ID = wri.RELEASE_INFO_ID) AS comment_count FROM wcc_release_info wri, wcc_user_concern wuc, wcc_user wu WHERE 1 = 1 AND wri.BELONG_USER_ID = wuc.BELONG_ID AND wu.USER_ID = wuc.BELONG_ID AND wri.STATUS = 1 AND wri.IS_DELETE = 0 AND wri.APPROVE_STATUS = 1 AND wuc.STATUS = 1 AND wuc.IS_DELETE = 0 AND wu.STATUS = 1 AND wu.IS_DELETE = 0 AND wuc.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY wri.CREATION_DATE DESC limit #{current} , #{size};
